2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><p dir="auto">To do a release of loglevel:</p><ul dir="auto"><li>Update the version number in <code>package.json</code> and <code>bower.json</code>.</li><li>Run <code>npm run dist</code> to build a distributable version in <code>dist/</code>.</li><li>Update the release history in this file (below).</li><li>Commit the built code, tagging it with the version number and a brief message about the release.</li><li>Push to Github.</li><li>Run <code>npm publish .</code> to publish to NPM.</li></ul><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto">Release History</h2><a id="user-content-release-history" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: Release History" href="#release-history"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><p dir="auto">v0.1.0 - First working release with apparent compatibility with everything tested</p><p dir="auto">v0.2.0 - Updated release with various tweaks and polish and real proper documentation attached</p><p dir="auto">v0.3.0 - Some bugfixes (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/12" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/12/hovercard">#12</a>, <a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/14" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/issues/14/hovercard">#14</a>), cookie-based log level persistence, doc tweaks, support for Bower and JamJS</p><p dir="auto">v0.3.1 - Fixed incorrect text in release build banner, various other minor tweaks</p><p dir="auto">v0.4.0 - Use LocalStorage for level persistence if available, compatibility improvements for IE, improved error messages, multi-environment tests</p><p dir="auto">v0.5.0 - Fix for Modernizr+IE8 issues, improved setLevel error handling, support for auto-activation of desired logging when console eventually turns up in IE8</p><p dir="auto">v0.6.0 - Handle logging in Safari private browsing mode (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/33" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/33/hovercard">#33</a>), fix <code>TRACE</code> level persistence bug (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/35" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/35/hovercard">#35</a>), plus various minor tweaks</p><p dir="auto">v1.0.0 - Official stable release! Fixed a bug with localStorage in Android webviews, improved CommonJS detection, and added <code>noConflict()</code>.</p><p dir="auto">v1.1.0 - Added support for including loglevel with preprocessing and <code>.apply()</code> (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/50" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/50/hovercard">#50</a>), and fixed QUnit dep version which made tests potentially unstable.</p><p dir="auto">v1.2.0 - New plugin API! Plus various bits of refactoring and tidy up, nicely simplifying things and trimming the size down.</p><p dir="auto">v1.3.0 - Make persistence optional in <code>setLevel()</code>, plus lots of documentation updates and other small tweaks</p><p dir="auto">v1.3.1 - With the new optional persistence, stop unnecessarily persisting the initially set default level (<code>WARN</code>)</p><p dir="auto">v1.4.0 - Add <code>getLevel()</code>, <code>setDefaultLevel()</code> and <code>getLogger()</code> functionality for more fine-grained log level control</p><p dir="auto">v1.4.1 - Reorder UMD (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/92" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/92/hovercard">#92</a>) to improve bundling tool compatibility</p><p dir="auto">v1.5.0 - Fix <code>log.debug</code> (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/111" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/issues/111/hovercard">#111</a>) after V8 changes deprecating console.debug, check for <code>window</code> upfront (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/104" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/104/hovercard">#104</a>), and add <code>.log</code> alias for <code>.debug</code> (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/64" data-hovercard-type="issue" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/issues/64/hovercard">#64</a>)</p><p dir="auto">v1.5.1 - Fix bug (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/112" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/112/hovercard">#112</a>) in level-persistence cookie fallback, which failed if it wasn't the first cookie present</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.0 - Add a name property to loggers and add <code>log.getLoggers()</code> (<a href="https://github.com/pimterry/loglevel/issues/114" data-hovercard-type="pull_request" data-hovercard-url="/pimterry/loglevel/pull/114/hovercard">#114</a>), and recommend unpkg as CDN instead of CDNJS.</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.1 - Various small documentation & test updates</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.2 - Include TypeScript type definitions in the package itself</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.3 - Avoid TypeScript type conflicts with other global <code>log</code> types (e.g. <code>core-js</code>)</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.4 - Ensure <code>package.json</code>'s <code>"main"</code> is a fully qualified path, to fix webpack issues</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.5 - Ensure the provided message is included when calling <code>trace()</code> in IE11</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.6 - Fix bugs in v1.6.5, which caused issues in node.js & IE < 9</p><p dir="auto">v1.6.7 - Fix a bug in environments with <code>window</code> defined but no <code>window.navigator</code></p><p dir="auto">v1.6.8 - Update TypeScript type definitions to include <code>log.log()</code>.</p><p dir="auto">v1.7.0 - Add support for Symbol-named loggers, and a <code>.default</code> property to help with ES6 module usage.</p><p dir="auto">v1.7.1 - Update TypeScript types to support Symbol-named loggers.</p><p dir="auto">v1.8.0 - Add <code>resetLevel()</code> method to clear persisted levels & reset to defaults</p><p dir="auto">v1.8.1 - Fix incorrect type definitions for <code>MethodFactory</code></p><p dir="auto">v1.9.0 - Added <code>rebuild()</code> method, overhaul dev & test setup, and fix some bugs (notably around cookies) en route</p><p dir="auto">v1.9.1 - Fix a bug introduced in 1.9.0 that broke <code>setLevel()</code> in some ESM-focused runtime environments</p><div class="markdown-heading" dir="auto"><h2 tabindex="-1" class="heading-element" dir="auto"><code>loglevel</code> for enterprise</h2><a id="user-content-loglevel-for-enterprise" class="anchor-element" aria-label="Permalink: loglevel for enterprise" href="#loglevel-for-enterprise"><svg class="octicon octicon-link" viewBox="0 0 16 16" version="1.1" width="16" height="16" aria-hidden="true"><path d="m7.775 3.275 1.25-1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1 4.95 4.95l-2.5 2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1-4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1 .018-1.042.751.751 0 0 1 1.042-.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l2.5-2.5a2.002 2.002 0 0 0-2.83-2.83l-1.25 1.25a.751.751 0 0 1-1.042-.018.751.751 0 0 1-.018-1.042Zm-4.69 9.64a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 2.83 0l1.25-1.25a.751.751 0 0 1 1.042.018.751.751 0 0 1 .018 1.042l-1.25 1.25a3.5 3.5 0 1 1-4.95-4.95l2.5-2.5a3.5 3.5 0 0 1 4.95 0 .751.751 0 0 1-.018 1.042.751.751 0 0 1-1.042.018 1.998 1.998 0 0 0-2.83 0l-2.5 2.5a1.998 1.998 0 0 0 0 2.83Z"></path></svg></a></div><p dir="auto">Available as part of the Tidelift Subscription.</p><p dir="auto">The maintainers of <code>loglevel</code> and thousands of other packages are working with Tidelift to deliver commercial support and maintenance for the open source dependencies you use to build your applications.
